lines.text:
[talking about sending his brother to four colleges]
The last one I had to buy him a chair. Ah, not like that.
Endowment they call it. Professor's graft. And it's stiff, too. An endowed chair in civic, to get him his... em... uh, whaddaya call it... uh...
What if we had three kids?
You'd be half done. I want six.

[speaking about all he did for his younger brother]
I sent him to four colleges. Four!
Officer, I'd like to file a complaint.
I haven't been kissed all day!

[booking Joe Scanlon, then examining the gun he was caught with]
Receipt for your toy, sonny. My granddaughter could use that for a paperweight - in her kindergarden.
